name: V_EHI_ELEM_VAL_PREV_CAPTION
description: This view contains the historical captions for SmartData element values.

columns.name: HLV_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the value record.

columns.name: UPDATE_NUM
columns.description: This column groups together rows of data that were stored together. A higher UPDATE_NUM means a more recent update.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: PREVIOUS_CAPTION
columns.description: This column stores the previous captions for SmartData element values.
